Items.Title: Oversight: Evaluating the Board of Elections’ Preparedness for the 2012 General Election and Various Proposals for Improving Elections in New York City.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight: Evaluating the Board of Elections’ Preparedness for the 2012 General Election and Various Proposals for Improving Elections in New York City.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to providing email notifications to prospective New York City voters.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Providing email notifications to prospective New York City voters.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to establishing a city employee poll worker program.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishing a city employee poll worker program.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the provision of voter registration materials to families.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Provision of voter registration materials to families.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to improving compliance with the City’s Pro-Voter Law.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Improving compliance with the City’s Pro-Voter Law.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to allowing for political contributions via text message.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Allowing for political contributions via text message.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to including information about candidates for federal, state, and county offices in the New York City voters guide.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Including information about candidates for federal, state, and county offices in the NYC voters guide.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to additional reporting by the board of elections to the council regarding performance.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Additional reporting by the board of elections to the council regarding performance.
